description:
SENSUAL BODY ARTS - The 9 Rooms Atelier

The Course includes:

  • Video Lessons
  • e-Book,PDF
  • e-Presentation, PDF
  • Video Demonstrations
  • Workbook
  • Questions and answers
  • Images

GOALS:

  • To bring by foundation knowledge and skills necessary for the practice of body arts, from colors, to creativity, methods and performance.
  • To introduce body arts as a practice for personal development and self-knowledge.
  • To bring by awareness and information related to how the practice of body arts brings joy and vitality to own individuals life.
  • To introduce sensual body arts and the 9 rooms atelier as a practice that empowers love relationships.

SKILLS :

The course encourage the development of the following skills:

  • Emotional self-awareness
  • Empathy
  • Creativity
  • Non verbal communication
  • Emotional self-management
  • Body awareness
  • Relaxation
  • Meditative doing
  • Conscious breathing
  • Sexual self-awareness.
  • Sexual clarity

PROGRAM

  • e-Book : Sensory body painting - the 9 rooms atelier. Read with video lessons and comments by the author. Know How to learn and practice sensory body painting.
  • Video review of the 9 rooms atelier process as a self-knowledge and personal development journey.
  • The advanced sensory body painting practice: the atelier room 9+, dedicated to love: e-presentation: Sensual Body Painting as an empowering experience for love relationships.
  • Sensory Body Painting and Sensual Body Arts skills. 
  • e-Workbooks
    • The creation of a performance: The vision, the wave of sensation, story telling, performance, completion.
    • Colors, shapes, presentations.
    • Sensual Body Arts for lovers - Prime Love
  • DYS : Do it yourself : Sensual Body Arts Atelier guided experience.
  • Demonstrations Videos with comments by the artist.
title: Sensual Body Arts - The 9 Rooms Atelier
